titleStmt.title: SII 8.55: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 55. (A.R. No. 467 of 1902). ON THE SAME WALL.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
� svasti śrī sakalapuvaṉaccakkaravattikaḷ śrīkopperuñciṅkadevaṟku yāṇṭu patiṉāṟāvatu nāḷ Irunūṟ ṟaṟupattiraṇṭu coḻakoṉ Olai . teṉṉavaṉ brahmamārāyarum maturāntakaviḻupparaiyarum Uṭaiyār tirucciṟṟampalamuṭaiyār koyil
śrīmā heśvarak kaṇkāṇi ceyvārkaḷum śrīkāriyañ ceyvārkaḷum sāmutāyañ ceyvārkaḷum koyilnāyakañ ceyvārkaḷum tirumāḷikaikkūṟu ceyvārkaḷum paṇṭārappottaka muṭaiyārkaḷum kaṇakkaruṅ kaṇṭu viṭutantatāvatu . koyillukkum
tirukkāmakkoṭṭamuṭaiya periyanācciyārkkum vecālippāṭippaṟṟu pūvālaiyil cokkacciyaṉ kamukutirunantavaṉattukku tirunantavaṉañ ceyya mutal koṇṭa nāyakam per Aiñcum per teṇṇūṟṟaiñcum Ākap per nūṟṟuvarkku Ilakkaikkum koṟṟukkum Ivvū
ril Aṭaitta nilam Irunūṟṟu nāṟpat teḻumā Araikkāṇiyiṉāl nellu Āṟāyirattu toḷāyirat torupatteṇ kalaṉe Irutūṇik kuṟuṇiyum patiṉaiñcāvatu nāḷ Irunūṟ ṟaṟupat tiraṇṭumutal Antarāyam pāṭṭam Uḷppaṭa Iṟaiyiliyāka Iṭṭut tevar tiru
veḻuttuc cāttiaruḷiṉa tirumukam vantamaiyil cokkacciyaṉeṉṉum tirunāmattāl ceyta kamukutirunantavaṉattukkum cuṟṟukkulaikkum vecālippāṭināṭṭuk kuṟuñci Aḷanāṭṭut tevatāṉam ciṟupālaiyūrppāl pūntamaṅkalattum Irājādhirājavaḷanā
ṭṭu kuṟuñci Aḷanāṭṭut tevatāṉam tāmaraiyāṉpāṭiyāṉa veḷaṅkaṉpaṭṭilum veḷḷāṟṟukku melkaraippaṭṭa tuṇṭattum kūṭiṉa nilattuk kamukutaṟaiyum cuṟṟukkulaiyum Uḷppaṭa virivu nilam Aṟupattumuṉṟumā mukkāṇi kīḻ mukkālum nīṅkalākavum Ittirunan
tavaṉañ ceyya veṇṭum perāy niccayitta nāyakam per Aiñcum per toṇṇūṟṟaiñcum Ākap per nūṟu Itil nāyakam per Aivarkku koṟṟukku nāḷ Oṉṟukku per Oṉṟukku mukkuṟuṇiyāka nellu kalaṉe mukkuṟuṇiyum puṭavaimutal Āṭṭaikku perāl muṉṟā
kak kācu patiṉaiñcum per toṇṇūṟṟaivarkku koṟṟukku nāḷ Oṉṟukku po Oṉṟukku nellu patakkāka nellu patiṉaiṅkalaṉe Irutūṇip patakkum puṭavaimutal Āṭṭaikkup perāl kācu Iraṇṭāka kācu nūṟṟuttoṇṇūṟum Ākap per nūṟṟuvarkku koṟṟukku nāḷ O
ṉṟukku nellu patiṉeḻu kalaṉe kuṟuṇiyum Āka Āṭṭaikku Uṭaiya nellukkum puṭavaimutal Āṭṭaikku kācu Irunūṟṟaiñcukkum kācu Oṉṟukku patiṉaiṅkalappaṭiyāl vanta nellukkum tevatāṉamāṉa Ūrkaḷil palapaṇi nivantakkāṟarkku cīvitamaṭaikkumpaṭi
yāluḷḷa nellukku vecālippāṭippaṟṟu jayaṅkoṇṭacoḻaccaruppetimaṅkalattuk kīḻpiṭākai pūvālaicuntaracoḻanallūril patiṉaiñcāvatu nāḷ Irunūṟ ṟaṟuppattiraṇṭu mutal Antarāyam pāṭṭam Uḷppaṭa tevatāṉa Iṟaiyili Iṭṭa nilam Irunū
ṟṟu nāṟpatteḻumā varaikkāṇikku māttāl nellu Irupatteṇ kalamāka nellu Āṟāyirattu toḷāyirat torupat toṉpatiṉ kalaṉe tūṇip patakkum Ākat tirunantavaṉattaṟai Uḷppaṭa nilam Eḻupatteḻaraiye nāṉmā varai muntirikaik kīḻmukkāliṉāl viri
vu nilam muṉṉūṟ ṟorupatumā mukkāṇi Araikkāṇik kiḻmukkālum Antarāyam pāṭṭa muḷppaṭa tevatāṉa Iṟaiili Iṭṭamaikku kulottuṅkacoḻaṉ tirumāḷikaiyil puṟavāyile kal veṭṭikkoḷḷakkaṭavatākap paṇṇuvate . kamukutaṟaiyum cuṟṟukkulaiyum
nilam Aṟupattumuṉṟumā mukkāṇik kiḻmukkālum tirunantavaṉakkuṭikaḷukku jivitam Aṭaitta nilam Irunūṟṟu nāṟpatteḻumā Araikkāṇiyiṉāl nellu Āṟāyirattut toḷāyirattu Orupattoṉpatiṉ kalaṉe tūṇi patakkukkum . Ivai coḻakoṉ Eḻuttu
Eṉṟu vanta Evaṟtiṭṭuppaṭi kal veṭṭiyatu .
Digital edition of SII 8.55 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
